alert.note: Alert for Burnett; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:26PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN WASHBURN AND EAST CENTRAL BURNETT COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Webb Lake Wisconsin, or 14 miles northwest of Spooner, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Minong around 555 PM CDT. Trego around 600 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lampson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
